text: The Village Doctor () is a 1951 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergey Gerasimov.Умер актер Николай СморчковСельский врач (1952) It stars Tamara Makarova, Grigori Belov, and Lena Belsky. == Actors == * Tamara Makarova as Dr. Tatyana Kazakova * Grigori Belov as Dr. Arsenyev * Lena Belsky as Young Mother * Ivan Bulganov as Sasha * Anatoly Dudorov as Dr. Anatoly Tyomkin * Vladimir Gulyaev as Viktor Potapov, steward * Georgy Millyar as Dmitry Vasilyevich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1951 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: The Village Doctor
